com.javagameengine.assets

Class NativeObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.assets.NativeObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeBuffer, Material, Mesh, OcclusionQuery, Shader, Sound, SoundBuffer, Texture

    public abstract class NativeObject
extends java.lang.Object
    NativeObject describes an object that can be loaded into the native system memory. It maintains an ID which the native system identifies the local copy by, and provides methods to load and remove the object from the native memory which are implemented by specific classes.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean create()
      Loads this object onto native memory and sets the ID to the native system ID
      abstract void destroy()
      Flags this object for removal from native memory
      static void destroyAll()
      Calls the destroy() method on all instantiated objects to clean up all resources used on the GPU.
      int getID()
      Obtains the ID given to this object in the native environment
      boolean isLive()

      • NativeObject

    • Method Detail

      • destroyAll

        public static void destroyAll()
        Calls the destroy() method on all instantiated objects to clean up all resources used on the GPU. Use only on program exit to free loose native memory.

      • create

        public abstract boolean create()
        Loads this object onto native memory and sets the ID to the native system ID
        Returns:
        True if the object was created successfully

      • destroy

        public abstract void destroy()
        Flags this object for removal from native memory

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Obtains the ID given to this object in the native environment
        Returns:
        ID of this object or -1 if the object is not yet live

      • isLive

        public boolean isLive()
        Returns:
        True if this object is loaded onto native memory
